com.flir.thermalsdk.live.discovery

Interface DiscoveryEventListener


  • public interface DiscoveryEventListener
    This interface needs be implemented by any class, which wants to receive notifications about discovery events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCameraFound(Identity identity)
      Called, when a new FLIR camera is found.
      default void onCameraLost(Identity identity)
      Called, when a known FLIR camera is lost.
      void onDiscoveryError(CommunicationInterface communicationInterface, ErrorCode error)
      Called, when a error has occurred during the scanning.
      default void onDiscoveryFinished(CommunicationInterface communicationInterface)
      This method is called, when discovery process has been finished externally (i.e.

    • Method Detail

      • onCameraFound

        @BackgroundThread
void onCameraFound(Identity identity)
        Called, when a new FLIR camera is found.
        Note: event is triggered on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        identity - the Identity describing found camera.

      • onDiscoveryError

        @BackgroundThread
void onDiscoveryError(CommunicationInterface communicationInterface,
                                        ErrorCode error)
        Called, when a error has occurred during the scanning. i.e a interface is turned off
        Note: event is triggered on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        communicationInterface - the CommunicationInterface defining the process that has encountered an error.
        error - the ErrorCode describing found camera.

      • onCameraLost

        @BackgroundThread
default void onCameraLost(Identity identity)
        Called, when a known FLIR camera is lost.
        Note: this callback is optional. Note: event is triggered on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        identity - the Identity describing lost camera.

      • onDiscoveryFinished

        @BackgroundThread
default void onDiscoveryFinished(CommunicationInterface communicationInterface)
        This method is called, when discovery process has been finished externally (i.e. OS limitation).
        This method is not called after CameraScanner.stop() is called.
        Note: this callback is optional. Note: event is triggered on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        communicationInterface - the CommunicationInterface defining the process that has ended.
